params.profileId: The token ID of the profile mapped to the publication to query.
params.pubId: The publication ID of the publication to query.

returns._0: ProfilePublicationData The ProfilePublicationData struct mapped to that publication.

params.data: The arbitrary data parameter, decoded into:      uint256 amount: The currency total amount to levy.      address currency: The currency address, must be internally whitelisted.      address recipient: The custom recipient address to direct earnings to.      uint16 referralFee: The referral fee to set.      bool followerOnly: Whether only followers should be able to collect.
params.profileId: The token ID of the profile of the publisher, passed by the hub.
params.pubId: The publication ID of the newly created publication, passed by the hub.

returns._0: bytes An abi encoded bytes parameter, which is the same as the passed data parameter.

processCollect(uint256,address,uint256,u.details: Processes a collect by:  1. Ensuring the collector is a follower  2. Charging a fee

getPublicationData(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the publication data for a given publication, or an empty struct if that publication was not initialized with this module.

initializePublicationCollectModule(uint2.notice: This collect module levies a fee on collects and supports referrals. Thus, we need to decode data.
